mapper.select: SELECT desktop_id, desktop_name, login_name, password, last_update FROM desktop WHERE desktop_id = #{id}
SELECT desktop_id, desktop_name, login_name, password, last_update FROM desktop WHERE desktop_name LIKE '%' + #{id} + '%';
SELECT desktop_id, desktop_name, login_name, password, last_update FROM desktop ORDER BY desktop_id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO desktop (desktop_name, login_name, password, last_update) VALUES (#{desktopName}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{lastUpdate});
mapper.update: UPDATE desktop SET desktop_name = #{desktopName}, login_name = #{loginName}, password = #{password}, last_update = #{lastUpdate} WHERE desktop_id = #{desktopId};
